location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1004 [Political Department] from Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Bombay Government, to the Assistant in Charge of the Bushire Residency

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of the receipt of the Assistant in Charge’s previous letter dated 31 May 1831, reporting on hostilities between Shaikh Tahnoon [Tahnun] of Abothabee [Abu Dhabi] and Sultan bin Suggur [Saqr] of Ra's al-Khaymah and Shaikh Rashid ben Humeed [Rashid bin Humayd al-Nuaimi] of Ajman. The Secretary writes that the Honourable Governor in Council approves of the Assistant’s conduct.
